actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East
Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that further steps may not be taken to implement the agreements between the United States and Iran until such time as the agreements receive Congressional approval.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that further steps may not be taken to implement the agreements between the United States and Iran relating to the resolution of the hostage and claims issues until the agreements receive Congressional approval.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that further steps may not be taken to implement the agreements between the United States and Iran until such time as the agreements receive Congressional approval.
